name: InvisiBall (oryam Halachmi)
description:
This game was made exclusively for the Quarantine jam.

Your objective is to survive for as long as possible and destroy the balls before they hit you.

How to play:

Search for Hexagons and aim by moving your crosshair around the screen.

Once you see an Hexagon in the circle around the crosshair , you'll be able to shoot it by pressing the left mouse button.

Some Hexagons give you special powers when destroyed.
